W) Rhyolitic [rye-oh-LIT-ik] lava has a lower melting temperature than basaltic lava X) Basaltic lava extrusion is typically explosive Y) Andesitic [an-deh-SIH-dik] lava has intermediate silica content Z) Rhyolitic lava typically flows more slowly than basaltic lava

X) BASALTIC LAVA EXTRUSION IS TYPICALLY EXPLOSIVE
******************
